chapter.text: 44|1|Ha-mima.
44|2|Sapata suspasta kitabara
44|3|niscaya iyaka ami aratirna karaicho eta barakatamaya raatita; niscaya ami satarkakarai.
44|4|Se'i raatita pratyeka curanta sid'dhanta sthira karaa haya
44|5|amara adesa anusarae. Niscaya amiye'i raachula praeranakarai.
44|6|Tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa rahamatasbaraupe; niscaya te'om sarbasraota, sarbajna
44|7|teraemi akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majara sakalo bastura raba; yadi tomaloke niscita bisbasi horaa.
44|8|Te'omra bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i, teraemi jirana dana karae arau teraemi mrtyu ghataya; teraemi tomalokara raba arau tomalokara pitr-purausasakalorao raba.
44|9|Baram sihamte sandehara basabarti hai khela-dhemali karai ache.
44|10|Eteke tumi apeksa karaa se'i dinatolai, yidina spasta dhomraarae acchanna ha’ba akasa
44|11|Yitorae manuhaka abrta karai pelaba. E'ito yantranadayaka sasti.
44|12|(Sihamte ka’ba) ‘he amara raba! Amara paraa sasti dura karai diya, niscaya ami mumina hama’.
44|13|Kenekai sihamte upadesa grahana karaiba? Athaca itipurbe sihamtara ocarata ahichila ejana spasta raachula
44|14|tara pichata sihamte te'omra paraa mukha ghuraa'i laichila arau kaichila, ‘e'om ejana siksapraapta unmada’.
44|15|Niscaya ami alapa samayara karane sasti rahita karaima, (kintu) niscaya tomaloka tomalokara agara arasthalai ubhati yaba.
44|16|Yidina ami prabalabharae karaayatta karaima, se'idina niscaya ami hama pratisodha grahanakarai.
44|17|Arau arasye ami ihamtara agata phira'a'una sampradayaka paraiksa karaichilo arau sihamtara ocarato ahichila ejana sanmanita raachula
44|18|(te'om phira'a'unaka kaichila) ‘allahara bandasakalaka molai gata'i diya. Niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula.
44|19|‘Arau tomaloke allahara biraud'dhe aud'dhatya prakasa nakaraiba, niscaya ma'i tomalokara ocarata spasta pramana lai ahima.
44|20|‘Tomalokara prastaraaghatara paraa ma'i mora pratipalaka arau tomalokara pratipalakara ocarata asraya bicaraicho.
44|21|‘Arau yadi tomaloke mora prati bisbasa sthapana nakaraa, tente moka erai guci yoraa’.
44|22|Tara pichata te'om nija pratipalakaka ahbana karai ka’le, ‘niscaya ihamta eta aparaadhi sampradaya’.
44|23|(Allahe ka’le) ‘tente tumi mora bandasakalaka lai raatira bhitarate ola'i yoraa, niscaya tomalokaka picha phalara paraa khedi yoraa ha’ba’.
44|24|‘Arau sagarakhanaka sthira thakibalai diya, niscaya sihamta ha’ba dubi maraa bahinira antarbhukta’.
44|25|Sihamte pichaphale erai gaichila bahuto udyana arau prasrarana
44|26|sasyaksetra arau suramya basasthana
44|27|arau nana dharanara bilasa-samagrai, ya’ta sihamte ananda upabhoga karaichila.
44|28|Enekuraa'i haichila, arau ami e'i sakaloborara uttaraadhikarai karaichilo eta belega sampradayaka.
44|29|Eteke akasa arau prthiraiye sihamtara babe asraupata karaa nachila arau sihamta arakasa praapta'o nachila.
44|30|Arau arasye ami bani icharaa'ilaka lanchanadayaka sastira paraa ud'dhara karaichilo
44|31|phira'a'unara paraa, niscaya si achila simalanghanakarai sakalara majata sirsasthaniya.
44|32|Arau ami jani bujiye sihamtaka sakalo srstira oparata nirbacita karaichilo.
44|33|Arau ami sihamtaka enekuraa nidarsanarali pradana karaichilo ya’ta achila suspasta paraiksa
44|34|niscaya sihamte (e'i katha sadaye) kai thake
44|35|‘amara prathama mrtyura bahirae ana eko na'i, arau ami ketiya'o punaraut'thita naha'om.
44|36|‘Eteke tomaloke yadi satyabadi horaa tente amara pitr-purausasakalaka lai aha’.
44|37|(Koraacona) sraestha kona, sihamta ne tubba sampradaya, ne sihamtara purbe yisakala achila sihamta? Ami sihamtaka dhbansa karaichilo. Niscaya sihamta achila aparaadhi.
44|38|Akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majata yi ache iyara ekorae'i ami dhemalira chalerae srsti karaa na'i
44|39|ami e'i duyoke yathayathabharae'i srsti karaicho, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i najane.
44|40|Niscaya mimansara dinato sihamta sakalorae babe nirdharaita samaya.
44|41|Se'idina ejana bandhu ana ejana bandhura kono kamata nahiba arau sihamte sahaya'o napaba.
44|42|Kintu allahe yara prati daya karaiba kerala te'om byatita. Niscaya allaha mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu.
44|43|Niscaya yakkuma gacha ha’ba
44|44|papira khadya
44|45|galita tamara darae, petara majata utali thakiba
44|46|utali thaka garama panira darae.
44|47|(Koraa ha’ba) ‘dharaa taka arau tani lai yoraa jahannamara madhyasthalata
44|48|‘tara pichata tara murara oparata utala panira sasti dhali diya’
44|49|(koraa ha’ba) ‘soraada loraa, niscaya tumi sanmanita, abhijata
44|50|‘niscaya e'itorae'i se'i sasti, yitoka tomaloke sandeha karaichila’.
44|51|Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba niraapada sthanata
44|52|baga-bagica arau nijaraasamuhara majata
44|53|Te'omloke paraidhana karaiba mihi pata arau raecami bastra arau ijane sijanara sanmukhata bahiba.
44|54|Enekuraa'i ha’ba, arau ami te'omlokara biya pati dima mrganayana hurasakalara lagata
44|55|tata te'omloke prasanta citte bibidha phalamula anibalai kaba.
44|56|Prathama mrtyura pichata te'omloke tata arau mrtyu asbadana nakaraiba. Te'om te'omlokaka jahannamara sastira paraa raksa karaiba
44|57|tomara pratipalakara anugrahasbaraupe, e'itorae'i maha saphalata.
44|58|Eteke niscaya ami tomara bhasata kora'anaka sahaja karai dicho, yate sihamte upadesa grahana karae.
44|59|Eteke tumi apeksa karaa, niscaya sihamte'o apeksakarai.
